data.name: SYNCHRONIZERS: UNDEAD MARINES
data.detailed_description:
"SYNCHRONIZERS: Undead Marines" is the first game of an amazing saga in a wonderful narrative universe.
This is a high-quality three-lane Tower Defense and Reverse Tower Defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows.
This feels like the perfect mixture of StarCraft with Plants Vs. Zombies!

Features:

- An emblematic story with wonderful characters, on the journey of increasing consciousness.
- An incredible and original soundtrack composed by Ale Navarro with the collaboration of modern and emergent musicians to boost the gameplay emotion.
- A weather system to change the mood of the game and refresh visually the different scenarios.
- More than twenty units to build your army of avatars and different strategies
- A Pranic Garden to let the player grow extraterrestrial trees and some animals to take care of.
- A Store to buy and upgrade your skills using in-game currency.
- An underground depot to develop technologies and gather units.
- More than 50 levels (with different lengths) on several planets with some secrets and amazing bosses.
- A unique command center (which must be protected) to take your decisions and get immersed in the story

Coming soon!

data.short_description: "SYNCHRONIZERS: Undead Marines" is a high-quality three-lane Tower Defense and Reverse Tower Defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows. This feels like the perfect mixture of StarCraft with Plants Vs. Zombies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Six Core
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
